Dashboard.TVL: Total value of collateral, liquidity and staked MIR
Dashboard.Liquidity: Total value of all mAssets and UST in liquidity pools

MIRCirculatingSupply.Liquidity: Number of MIR in liquidity pool
MIRCirculatingSupply.Staked: Number of MIR staked in governance
MIRCirculatingSupply.Others: Number of MIR in community pool or held by users

mAsset.MarketCap: Total value of all minted assets
mAsset.Transactions: Number of transactions occurred in the last 24 hours
mAsset.Fee: Value of trading fee paid in the last 24 hours

Chart.Liquidity: Total value of all mAssets and UST in liquidity pools
Chart.Volume: Total value of all assets traded in the last 24 hours. The chart data is accumulated on daily basis.

My.TotalValue: Total value of all holdings, collateral, withdrawable liquidity, rewards, staked MIR and UST.

Total.Holding: Total value of all assets held
Total.LimitOrder: Total value of assets locked in unfilled limit orders
Total.Borrowing: Total collateral value minus total borrowed value
Total.Pool: Total value of all mAssets and UST withdrawable from liquidity pools
Total.Farming: Total value of all mAssets and UST withdrawable from farming pools
Total.Gov: Total value of staked MIR and unclaimed voting rewards

My.TotalRewards: Total number of claimable MIR from Farming positions and governance
My.Borrowing: List of borrowing and short positions
My.Farming: List of long and short farming positions
My.TotalHoldingValue: Total value of all assets held
My.Balance: Quantity of the corresponding asset held
My.Value: Value of the corresponding asset held
My.TotalBorrowedValue: Total value of all assets borrowed or shorted
My.TotalCollateralValue: Total value of all collateral locked
My.Borrowed: Quantity of the corresponding asset borrowed
My.Collateral: Quantity of collateral locked for the corresponding borrow position
My.CollateralRatio: Ratio of the Collateral Value to the Borrowed Value
My.PositionWarning: Position is close to liquidation. Close the position or deposit more collateral. When collateral ratio drops below the minimum value, any user may immediately liquidate the position.
My.PositionDanger: Position can be liquidated anytime upon request. Close the position or deposit more collateral.
My.TotalLockedUST: Total quantity of UST locked shorting
My.LockedUST: Quantity of UST locked from shorting
My.UnlockedUST: Quantity of claimable UST from this short position
My.Withdrawable: Quantity of withdrawable assets from the corresponding asset liquidity pool
My.FarmReward: Quantity of claimable rewards for the corresponding staking position
My.VotingRewards: Total quantity of claimable rewards from all voted polls
My.GovReward: Protocol fee paid from withdrawing collateral is distributed to MIR stakers and increases staked MIR
My.AccRewards: Total quantity of rewards accumulated from staking MIR
My.LimitOrder: List of trade orders to be executed at the limit price
My.LimitPrice: Price at which the order will be executed
My.TotalLockedValue: Total value of assets locked in unfilled limit orders

Forms.TxFee: Fee paid to execute this transaction

Send.ShuttleFee: A fee of 1 UST or 0.1% of the transfer amount (whichever is greater) will be charged for transferring assets from Terra to Ethereum/BSC through Shuttle

Trade.Premium: Percentage difference between Terraswap and Oracle price
Trade.Price:
Price is based on the pool ratio. The effective price changes dynamically depending on the trade size.

• Spread: Fee paid due to the difference between market price and estimated price.
• Commission: Fee charged by the protocol that is automatically deducted from the assets that user receives.
Trade.MinimumReceived: Expected minimum quantity to be received based on the current price, maximum spread, and commission
Trade.SlippageTolerance: Your transaction will revert if the price changes by more than this percentage.

Mint.MinimumCollateralRatio: Lowest collateral ratio to borrow this asset
Mint.Open: New assets will be borrowed when collateral is deposited. Any price change of either the collateral or the borrowed assets may lead to liquidation.
Mint.Caution: Your position can be liquidated when it falls below the minimum collateral ratio
Mint.ExpectedMintedAsset: Expected quantity of assets received with above collateral
Mint.CollateralRatio: Ratio of the collateral value to the borrowed value
Mint.MinCollateralRatio: Minimum collateral ratio. When the position drops below this value, any user may immediately liquidate the position.
Mint.Price: Price of the corresponding asset that is determined by the oracle feeder
Mint.ExpectedUST: UST from shorting mAsset will be locked for 15 days

Farm.LongAPR:
Annualized MIR reward return from providing the asset's liquidity.
The APR based on premium is updated once every hour.
Farm.ShortAPR:
Annualized MIR reward return from depositing collateral to create short position.
The APR based on premium is updated once every hour.
Farm.Premium: Percentage difference between Terraswap and Oracle price
Farm.Long: Provide liquidity to receive LP tokens which are staked to earn MIR token rewards
Farm.InputAsset: Quantity of assets to be added to the corresponding asset liquidity pool
Farm.InputUST: Corresponding required amount of UST added to the liquidity pool
Farm.Short: Provide collateral to create short positions and earn MIR token rewards.
Farm.Shorted: Expected quantity of assets shorted with above collateral
Farm.UnstakeAmount: Quantity of LP tokens to be burned
Farm.Output: Estimated quantity of mAsset and UST to be received
Farm.PoolPrice: Price of the corresponding asset that is determined by the current pool ratio
Farm.PoolShare: Ratio of the liquidity provided to the total liquidity provided post-transaction
Farm.LPfromTx: Quantity of LP tokens to be received

Gov.TotalStaked: Total quantity of MIR tokens staked
Gov.StakingRatio: Ratio of the quantity of staked MIR tokens to the total quantity of MIR
Gov.APR:
Annualized MIR staking return based on 15 days average of MIR distribution and staking ratio. 

Reward is generated from protocol fee which occurs when collateral is withdrawn from borrow or short position.
Gov.CommunityPoolBalance: Total number of MIR tokens currently in the community pool
Gov.Polls: Staked MIR can be used as voting power in polls that are currently in progress
Gov.Ticker: Ticker of asset to be whitelisted
Gov.ListedExchange: Exchange that the underlying asset trades on
Gov.AuctionDiscount: Discount rate applied to collateral sold in liquidation auction
Gov.MinimumCollateralRatio: Lowest collateral ratio which users can set to mint new assets. Position will be liquidated below this ratio
Gov.Deposit: Passing the quorum will return the deposit to the creator. Failure to pass quorum will distribute the deposit to all MIR stakers.
Gov.MintPeriod: Number of seconds which minting of Pre-IPO assets will be allowed for
Gov.MinimumCollateralRatioAfterIPO: Lowest collateral ratio which users can set to borrow new assets after IPO event.
Gov.PreIpoPrice: Fixed price to be used for borrowing of Pre-IPO asset
Gov.Quorum: Minimum quorum required for accepting a poll (in percentage)
Gov.Threshold: Minimum percentage of YES votes to pass a poll (in percentage)
Gov.VotingPeriod: Length of poll (in units of seconds)
Gov.EffectiveDelay: Length of delay before protocol integration for a passed poll (in units of seconds)
Gov.ExpirationPeriod: Length of expiration period when for a failed poll (in units of seconds)
Gov.ProposalDeposit: Minimum deposit to start a poll (in units of MIR)
Gov.VoterWeight: Ratio of protocol fee reward to be distributed to voters
Gov.Multiplier: Multiplied to minimum collateral ratio of the borrowed asset
